about_the_game:
Malpractice is an Online Co-Op Horror Experience for up to 4 players. You and your friends wake up in a plagued hospital where a terrible virus has begun to spread. Your task is find a way out, and not lose your life in the process. Solve puzzles, Discover secrets, and avoid corrupted entities as you uncover the mystery behind the outbreak.



The spread of the virus has fatal effects on most hosts, however a small few cases yielded horrifying outcomes as its host becomes terribly mutated and animalistic in its attempt to fight off the virus, You and your friends will need to be careful as you make your way throughout the hospital. Something could be lurking behind any corner.



In an attempt to halt the rapid spread of the virus, the hospital has gone in to a lockdown protocol. In combination with avoiding the looming threats throughout the various rooms and halls, You and your friend will need to solve various unique puzzles and piece together clues in order to make your way to safety.

Utilize the Inventory system to collect and distribute key items, tools, and weaponry that will aid you in finding a way out.



Play alongside up to 4 friends and work together to discover a way out. With a vast set of puzzles within the game, each player is likely to experience a new set of challenges on each playthrough. Proximity voice chat is included, allowing players to join and interact not only with their friends, but with anyone looking to play.

name: Malpractice

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 ／ Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 470 with 4GB VRAM ／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 ／ Intel Core i7 8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700／ NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: Malpractice is an Online Multiplayer Horror Experience. Solve puzzles, discover secrets, and avoid corrupted entities to escape a plague ridden hospital.
